#include <cvmx-dfa.h>

union {
   struct {
      uint64_t   gxor:8
 Graph XOR value (PASS3/CN58XX), Must be zero for other chips or if DFA_CFG[GXOR_ENA] == 0.
      uint64_t   nxoren:1
 Node XOR enable (PASS3/CN58XX), Must be zero for other chips or if DFA_CFG[NXOR_ENA] == 0.
      uint64_t   nreplen:1
 Node Replication mode enable (PASS3/CN58XX), Must be zero for other chips or if DFA_CFG[NRPL_ENA] == 0 or IWORD0[Ty] == 0.
      uint64_t   snrepl:2
 Start_Node Replication (PASS3/CN58XX), Must be zero for other chips or if DFA_CFG[NRPL_ENA] == 0 or IWORD0[Ty] == 0 or IWORD0[NREPLEN] == 0.
      uint64_t   start_node_id:20
 Start node index for the root of the graph.
   } 
   uint32_t   start_node
 Start node index for the root of the graph, incl.
};

Detailed Description

Abstract DFA graph.

Field Documentation

union { ... }
uint64_t cvmx_dfa_graph_t::base_address

LLM start address of the graph.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_graph_t::gxor

Graph XOR value (PASS3/CN58XX), Must be zero for other chips or if DFA_CFG[GXOR_ENA] == 0.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_graph_t::nreplen

Node Replication mode enable (PASS3/CN58XX), Must be zero for other chips or if DFA_CFG[NRPL_ENA] == 0 or IWORD0[Ty] == 0.

int cvmx_dfa_graph_t::num_marked_nodes

Number of marked nodes in the graph.

Only needed for small graphs.

int cvmx_dfa_graph_t::num_terminal_nodes

Number of terminal nodes in the graph.

Only needed for small graphs.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_graph_t::nxoren

Node XOR enable (PASS3/CN58XX), Must be zero for other chips or if DFA_CFG[NXOR_ENA] == 0.

cvmx_llm_replication_t cvmx_dfa_graph_t::replication

Level of memory replication to use.

Must match the LLM setup

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_graph_t::snrepl

Start_Node Replication (PASS3/CN58XX), Must be zero for other chips or if DFA_CFG[NRPL_ENA] == 0 or IWORD0[Ty] == 0 or IWORD0[NREPLEN] == 0.

uint32_t cvmx_dfa_graph_t::start_node

Start node index for the root of the graph, incl.

snrepl (PASS3/CN58XX) NOTE: for backwards compatibility this name includes the the gxor, nxoren, nreplen, and snrepl fields which will all be zero in applicaitons existing before the introduction of these fields, so that existing applicaiton do not need to change.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_graph_t::start_node_id

Start node index for the root of the graph.

cvmx_dfa_graph_type_t cvmx_dfa_graph_t::type

Type of graph.
